ch0136_00_platane_salon/8201_2003_01_10:
Well, if it isn’t [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I see
you’re your usual sparkling self! Shall we have
some tea together?
ch0136_00_platane_salon/8201_2101_01_10: Oh, yes! I have this for you!
ch0136_00_platane_salon/8201_2101_02_10: Take it with you. It may come in handy!
ch0136_00_platane_salon/8201_2102_01_10:
Do you have a use for this type of
thing, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0136_00_platane_salon/8201_2102_02_10:
Go ahead and take it! I don’t use these
much myself.
ch0136_00_platane_salon/8201_2103_01_10:
Look what I brought for you! Go on,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]. Take it!
ch0136_00_platane_salon/8201_2103_02_10:
You don’t need a reason to give a gift! Anytime
is the right time to express your gratitude!
ch0136_00_platane_salon/8201_2103_03_10:
That may sound a little phony, but it really
is important!
ch0136_00_platane_salon/8201_2203_01_10:
Yes, definitely! Let’s talk! Your stories are always
so interesting, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0136_00_platane_salon/8201_2302_01_10:
Thank you! I’ll take good care of any gift
from you!
ch0136_00_platane_salon/8201_2301_01_10:
Wow! What a great choice! Thank you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0136_00_platane_salon/8201_2301_02_10:
I’ve definitely got to give you something in return
for this! I’ll be sure to make some time for you
soon. Just you wait—it’s going to be great!
ch0136_00_platane_salon/8201_2402_01_10:
I had a good time today! Let’s talk
again sometime!
ch0136_00_platane_salon/8201_2401_01_10:
Time sure flies when you’re having fun. And that
was definitely time well spent!
ch0136_00_platane_salon/8201_2401_02_10:
I’ll try to think of even more interesting stories to
share with you next time, so let’s talk again soon!
ch0136_00_platane_salon/8001_0701_01_10:
Hi, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! This sure is a nice
place, isn’t it? So relaxing!
ch0136_00_platane_salon/8001_0701_02_10:
It’s also a great place for concentrating on my
work, so I come here a lot.
ch0136_00_platane_salon/8002_0701_01_10:
There are so many mysteries still surrounding
Pokémon apart from Mega Evolution.
ch0136_00_platane_salon/8002_0701_02_10:
But there are also passionate researchers
determined to solve all of those mysteries!
ch0136_00_platane_salon/8002_0701_03_10:
And all of us work together to piece together the
puzzles Pokémon pose! Pretty cool, eh?
ch0136_00_platane_salon/8003_0701_01_10:
The beans are what determine the flavor you get
from a cup of coffee!
ch0136_00_platane_salon/8003_0701_02_10:
A lot of the coffee available here on Pasio is
made with pretty rare beans, so I recommend
trying a variety!
ch0136_00_platane_salon/8003_0701_03_10:
Some types of beans are particularly expensive,
and they require a specific brewing
method, and—
ch0136_00_platane_salon/8003_0701_04_10:
Oh, sorry! There I go, getting carried away and
rambling again!
